column4: can anyone tell me how direct rendering could have got disabled?
nope, stock edgy kernel, I haven't touched it
make sure the ati/nvidia module from restricted modules does not load ... I forget where to black list it
hrmm I guess that could be it, it's a 945gm chip, not nv/ati
what driver does X use? (check in /etc/X11/xorg.conf)
It literally just stopped working, I suddenly noticed I couldn't play video, and then found direct rendering was disabled =/ any ideas?
is i810 is in the xorg.conf?
bah, wasn't loaded, sec trynig now
I did :P I think the reason I didn't see it loaded was because X wasn't running, hehe
agpgart and everything are enabled, drm is loaded as well, and has i810 listed as a dep
it's using Mesa GLX Indirect, I'm pretty sure it wasn't using that before
